analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#83-84) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#181-217)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#296-319)
	- generateTokens (/unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#390-404)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#408-425)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#490-494) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#230-248):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#245-246)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#246-247)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#521-535) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#530-532)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#457) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#494-501)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#490-494)
	- /unique_contracts/0x1c3bed5bd4b0e6a8389efd0d2876f948a907ab5b.sol#491-493
